title: What an ancient Chinese hero’s fatal love of raw fish warns us about uncooked food
description: Tokyo’s famed New Year fish auction has smashed its own headline record, with a giant bluefin tuna fetching an eye-watering price. At the Toyosu fish market’s first auction of 2026, a 243kg (535lb) bluefin tuna was snapped up for 510 million yen (US$3.2 million), making it the most expensive tuna ever sold at this annual ritual.The winning bid came from Kiyomura, the company behind the popular Sushi Zanmai chain. The purchase eclipsed the company’s own record-setting bid from 2019.The fish...

title: ‘The UnXplained’ takes a look at ancient structures during season 8 premiere
description: During the season eight premiere episode of "The UnXplained" host William Shatner takes viewers all over the world to examine ancient structures.

title: T. rex fossil discovery rewrites dinosaur history and reveals how long they really lived
description: Scientists believe they now know the true lifespan of the Tyrannosaurus rex, rewriting what was known about the ancient predators.

title: Fossil Discovery Sparks First Dino Dig at Monument in 100 Years
description: Construction workers found the relics of a past life while building a parking lot.
